Converts a sf data.frame to a normal dataframe

Source: R/sfWrapper3D.R
sf2df.3d.Rd

Converts a sf data.frame to a normal dataframe

sf2df.3d(track)

Arguments

track

An object of type 'sf, data.frame'

Value

A data.frame.

Examples

sf2df.3d(track2sf.3d(niclas, CRS = 4326))
#>          x       y        z            a        g           t             l
